title: Need help with weird skin idea
body:
Summer job Vladimir. Picture Vladimir wearing a t-shirt in similar style to dunkmaster Darius clothes, swimming trunks, maybe with a thin jacket to keep the coat style animation and a sunvisor to keep the weird hair style. In his left hand he has a Melting blue popsicle which would replace the red orb he ussualy Carries around.
When using Q the effect would match the popsicles blue Color.
When using his W he would turn himself into a pool of melted vanilla and maybe strawberry or choclate ice cream. When using his E he would Throw ice cream cones at nearby enemies. I need help with the ult seeing that i cant figure out something that would not be a recolor.

replies.body: the ult can be water. and his abilities should also have a SFX. his backing animation can be him going on the pool and disappearing
